community.title: Data Grid Essentials
community.description: Row and column configurations, sorting, filtering, and pagination.

community.title: Cell Rendering
community.description: Custom cell rendering - use your own components inside cells.

community.title: Performance Optimisations
community.description: Column and row virtualization enabled by default.

community.title: Major Frameworks
community.description: Support for React, Angular and Vue, in addition to vanilla JavaScript.

enterprise.title: Server-Side Row Model
enterprise.description: Efficiently handle large datasets by loading data on-demand from the server.

enterprise.title: Excel Export
enterprise.description: Advanced export options, including styles and formulas.

enterprise.title: Pivot Tables & Aggregations
enterprise.description: Built-in pivot and aggregation capabilities for complex data analysis.

enterprise.title: Range Selection
enterprise.description: Select and manipulate ranges of data.

enterprise.title: Integrated Charts
enterprise.description: Create and customise charts directly within the grid.

enterprise.title: Master/Detail View
enterprise.description: Nested grid views for hierarchical data representation.

enterprise.title: Row Grouping & Multi-Column Sorting
enterprise.description: Advanced grouping and sorting options for better data organisation.

enterprise.title: Clipboard Operations
enterprise.description: Enhanced copy and paste functionality, including support for Excel-like behaviour.

enterprise.title: Tool Panels
enterprise.description: Built-in configuration panels for columns and filters, or create your own custom panels.

enterprise.title: Custom Context Menu & Sidebars
enterprise.description: Additional UI elements for enhanced user interaction and customisation.

community.title: Chart Essentials
community.description: Basic chart types, including line, bar, column, and pie charts.

community.title: Accessibility Support
community.description: Fully accessible charts with keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

community.title: Basic Interactivity
community.description: Highlight data items or entire series and add tooltips to provide extra contextual information.

community.title: Intuitive Data Handling
community.description: Handles your data in its existing format, no transformation required.

community.title: Themes and Styling
community.description: Customise backgrounds, layouts, overlays, and themes to match your brand.

community.title: Localisation
community.description: Support for 31 languages and integration with localisation engines.

community.title: Download API
community.description: Trigger browser-based image downloads of Charts in Base64 and PNG.

community.title: Event API
community.description: Listen to and respond to user interactions with Charts and Series.

community.title: Major Frameworks
community.description: Support for React, Angular and Vue, in addition to vanilla JavaScript.

enterprise.title: Advanced Chart Types
enterprise.description: Access to 20+ additional chart types, including Range, Heatmap, Sankey and more.

enterprise.title: Financial Charts
enterprise.description: Build interactive financial charts with minimal configuration.

enterprise.title: Animations
enterprise.description: Control charts initial load and data update animations.

enterprise.title: Advanced Interactivity
enterprise.description: Context menus, crosshairs, navigator, zoom and chart synchronisation.

enterprise.title: Background Images
enterprise.description: Add background images to charts for branding or context.

enterprise.title: Dedicated Support
enterprise.description: Priority support with guaranteed response times, bug fixes, and direct access to the AG Grid team.
